description: Cross the treacherous river by hopping on moving logs in this classic timing challenge.
rationale: This game focuses on the core river-crossing mechanic of the classic arcade genre, emphasizing velocity matching and precise spatial timing. It provides a clean environment for AI agents to learn movement relative to moving platforms.
details: The game features a grid-based movement system where a frog must navigate from the bottom bank to the top goal. The middle area is a river with multiple lanes. Each lane has logs moving at different speeds and directions. If the frog is on a log, it inherits the log's horizontal velocity. The game ends if the frog touches the water (falling off a log or missing a jump) or hits the screen boundaries while drifting on a log. Obstacles include varying log lengths and speeds. The goal is to reach the safety of the top bank to score points.

game_rules.lose_condition: Touch river area without a log, or move outside x-axis boundaries
game_rules.scoring: 10 points for forward movement, 500 points for reaching the goal

how_to_stop: kill the process or press the ESC key
how_to_play: Use the arrow keys (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT) to move the frog one grid cell at a time. Jump onto moving logs to cross the river. Ensure you stay within the screen boundaries while the log carries you horizontally. Reach the top grass area to win.
